## Load Package
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
```

```{r}
# read csv file extracted
team_link <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/moham6839/Data607_Final_Project/master/Team_Clutch_Data.csv"
team_stat_link <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/moham6839/Data607_Final_Project/master/Team_Stat_Regular_Season_Datat.csv"
nba_teamclutch_dataset <- read_csv(team_link)
nba_teamstat_dataset <- read_csv(team_stat_link)
```
